name: PDFgear
description: PDFgear is a free, AI-powered PDF editor offering tools to edit, convert, annotate, and manage PDF files across multiple platforms.
longDescription: PDFgear is an all-in-one PDF management solution designed to simplify document editing, conversion, and organization for personal and professional users. It provides a robust set of free tools, both online and offline, to handle tasks like merging, splitting, compressing, and signing PDFs without requiring subscriptions or accounts. The platform integrates AI technology through its PDFgear Copilot, which streamlines workflows by allowing users to interact with documents using natural language commands. Available on Windows, macOS, iOS, and web browsers, PDFgear ensures cross-platform compatibility and accessibility. Its mission is to make PDF processing efficient, secure, and cost-free, challenging expensive alternatives like Adobe Acrobat. The software is particularly praised for its user-friendly interface and enterprise-level features, serving students, professionals, and businesses globally.
features: Edit PDF text and images directly, making documents as editable as Microsoft Word while preserving original formatting.
Convert PDFs to and from formats like Word, Excel, PowerPoint, JPG, and TXT with lossless quality and batch processing.
Annotate PDFs with highlights, underlines, stamps, shapes, and text boxes for enhanced document markup.
Merge multiple PDFs into a single file or split large PDFs into smaller documents for better organization.
Compress PDF files by up to 90% to reduce file size without sacrificing quality, ideal for storage and sharing.
Sign PDFs with customizable digital signatures created via trackpad, keyboard, or image uploads, compliant with e-signature regulations.
Perform OCR on scanned or image-based PDFs to extract editable text in over 30 languages for free.
Organize PDF pages by rotating, deleting, extracting, or reordering them with a simple drag-and-drop interface.
Use PDFgear Copilot, an AI-powered assistant, to summarize content, extract information, or execute editing tasks via natural language.
Fill out interactive PDF forms with text fields, checkboxes, and other elements for seamless document completion.

faqs.question: Is PDFgear really free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, PDFgear is completely free with no watermarks, subscriptions, or account requirements, though advanced features may become paid in the future.

faqs.question: Does PDFgear require an internet connection to work?
faqs.answer: PDFgear offers offline desktop and mobile apps for editing PDFs without internet, though some online tools require connectivity.

faqs.question: How secure is PDFgear for sensitive documents?
faqs.answer: PDFgear uses military-grade encryption and complies with e-signature regulations to ensure document security and privacy.

faqs.question: Can PDFgear handle scanned or image-based PDFs?
faqs.answer: Yes, PDFgearâ€™s free OCR feature converts scanned or image-based PDFs into editable text in over 30 languages.

faqs.question: What platforms does PDFgear support?
faqs.answer: PDFgear is available on Windows, macOS, iOS, and web browsers, with Android support in development.

faqs.question: How does the PDFgear Copilot AI feature work?
faqs.answer: PDFgear Copilot uses ChatGPT-powered AI to let users summarize PDFs, extract information, or perform edits via simple text commands.

faqs.question: Can I merge or split PDFs with PDFgear?
faqs.answer: Yes, PDFgear allows users to merge multiple PDFs into one or split a PDF into smaller files with an intuitive interface.

faqs.question: Does PDFgear support digital signatures?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can create and save digital signatures for signing PDFs, compliant with eIDAS and E-Sign standards.
